articles.title: DPRK Friendship Delegation Leaves for China
articles.content:
DPRK Friendship Delegation Leaves for China
 Pyongyang, July 9 (KCNA) -- A friendship delegation of the DPRK led by Yang Hyong Sop, vice-president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly, left Pyongyang Saturday. It will take part in celebrations of the 50th anniversary of the DPRK-China treaty of friendship, cooperation and mutual assistance at the invitation of the Chinese government.

articles.title: DPRK Delegations Leave to Visit Various Countries
articles.content:
DPRK Delegations Leave to Visit Various Countries
 Pyongyang, July 9 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the DPRK-China Friendship Association led by Choe Chang Sik, minister of Public Health and chairman of the Central Committee of the Association, left here for China Saturday to attend the celebrations of the 50th anniversary of the DPRK-China treaty of friendship, cooperation and mutual assistance.
					 Also leaving were a DPRK government economic delegation led by Ri Ryong Nam, minister of Foreign Trade, to take part in the 7th meeting of the DPRK-Syria Joint Economic Committee to be held in Damascus and a delegation of the DPRK Olympic Committee led by its Vice-Chairman Son Kwang Ho, vice-minister of Physical Culture and Sports, to participate in the 30th meeting of the Asian Olympic Council to be held in Tokyo.

articles.title: Japanese Delegation Here
articles.content:
Japanese Delegation Here
 Pyongyang, July 9 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Japan Nagano Prefectural People's Council for Supporting the Independent and Peaceful Reunification of Korea led by Hiroji Nakagawa, member of the Nagano Prefectural Assembly, arrived here Saturday.

articles.title: DPRK Embassies Visited by Foreign Personalities
articles.content:
DPRK Embassies Visited by Foreign Personalities 
 Pyongyang, July 9 (KCNA) -- The chairwoman and vice-chairman of the Party for Peace and Unity of Russia, the general director for the international relations Department of the Iranian "Workers' House", the chairperson of the Tehran City Committee, the chairman and vice-chairmen of the International Taekwon-Do Association of Iran and the chairman of the Nigerian Group for the Study of the Juche Philosophy visited the DPRK embassies in their countries from June 27 to July 6 on the occasion of the 17th anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung.
					 They laid floral baskets and bouquets before the portraits of President Kim Il Sung and paid tribute to him.
					
					 They lauded Kim Il Sung as a great statesman, iron-willed commander and popular leader of the 20th century recognized by the whole world, adding though he passed away, he is always alive in the hearts of progressive mankind for his great exploits.
					
					 They expressed belief that the Korean people would build a great prosperous and powerful nation and accomplish the cause of national reunification without fail under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Il, creditable successor to the revolutionary cause of the President.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak Group's Anti-Reunification Education Flayed
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak Group's Anti-Reunification Education Flayed
 Pyongyang, July 9 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Education Commission of the DPRK issued a statement on Friday.
					 The group of traitors is persisting in extreme provocations at frontline units of puppet army rattling the nerves of the DPRK. It is frantically staging farces of the anti-reunification education slandering the system of the DPRK while inciting the inter-Korean confrontation among inhabitants of south Korea.
					
					 The puppet Ministry of Unification's distribution of extremely unsavory textbooks for "unification education" malignantly slandering the DPRK and beautifying the policy of confrontation towards the DPRK is another unpardonable provocation against it.
					
					  The gentry of the ministry filled the textbooks with phrases advocating extreme hatred for compatriots, confrontation of systems and "unification through absorption" after deleting all the expressions like "partnership", "dialogue and relations of cooperation" mentioned as regards the inter-Korean relations from them.
					
					 The group went the lengths of distorting facts about the June 25 war and the military clashes between the north and the south caused by them by describing them as "southward invasion" and "provocations from the north" and impudently hurting even the system in the DPRK and the dignity of its leadership. 
					
					 That is why, even those concerned with education in south Korea as well as broad public are becoming increasingly critical of new textbooks, terming them  "guidelines for the education in the divided country", not textbooks for "unification education".
					
					 The ministry is blustering that it would distribute the above-said textbooks among all primary, middle and secondary schools, libraries, educational and research institutions across south Korea to enforce such education among all the inhabitants. 
					
					 These dastardly moves are lashing educationists and other people in the DPRK as well as all other Koreans into great fury.
					
					The commission vehemently denounces the group of traitors for publishing such textbooks as another serious provocation against the DPRK, insult to sacred education and crimes against reunification, the nation and ethics as they reveal its sinister intention to win in the confrontation of systems.
					
					 Education is regarded as inviolable in any society as it is meant to teach justice, truth and scientific knowledge and bring up true social beings.
					
					 The "unification education" touted by the group is an unheard-of hideous move to falsify truth and stir up extreme hostility and consciousness of confrontation among compatriots in a bid to turn them into sworn enemy.
					
					 What is more intolerable is that Minister of Unification Hyon In Thaek who claims to be a professor spearheaded the recent publication of textbooks. He instructed to completely rewrite textbooks from the viewpoint of confrontation despite strong public criticism and directly examined their contents. He made sure that such textbooks were printed in hundreds of thousands of copies and let the Ministry cover the expenses for their distribution on a priority basis, stunning the public. 
					
					 These facts go to clearly prove that he is an anti-reunification confrontation maniac and a bete noire.
					
					 History records such war criminals as Nazi Hitler who infused xenophobia and chauvinism into his people, hurling so many people of the world into shambles of the World War but does not know such immoral group as Hyon's gentry who stooped to such unethical acts against compatriots.
					
					 The hideous provocations perpetrated by the puppet military warmongers are results of such anti-reunification education for confrontation.
					
					 The above-said moves are nothing but last-ditch efforts of those thrown into the bottomless abyss of crisis by the total failure of their domestic and foreign policies, towering public grudge and people's criticism. They will only spark off denunciation and disillusion among the people at home and abroad and hasten their shameful destruction.
					
					 The group of traitors including Hyon who have no choice but to use even education related to the future of the nation, as a lever for escalating the confrontation with compatriots are bound to face a miserable fate, cursed and condemned by the nation.

articles.title: US Forces in S. Korea Urged to Withdraw from It
articles.content:
US Forces in S. Korea Urged to Withdraw from It 
						
 Pyongyang, July 9 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the North Headquarters of the Nationwide Special Committee for Probing the Truth behind the GIs' Crimes released a statement Saturday on the lapse of 45 years since the south Korean puppet forces signed the humiliating "Status of Forces Agreement" (SOFA) with the United States.
					 The agreement concluded on July 9, 1966 is a document of slavery of modern version as it legalizes the presence of the U.S. imperialist forces for aggression in south Korea and connives at their arbitrary practices and crimes and grants limitless privilege and status to them in trial of criminals, use of land and facilities, taxes, immigration control, etc., the statement said, and went on:
					
					 On the strength of this humiliating and unequal agreement the U.S. forces have committed all sorts of crimes including violence, plunder, murder and rape almost every day and lorded it over south Korea as a real ruler and extraterritorial entity for the last 45 years. 
					
					 Still vivid in the memories of people are innumerable shuddering atrocities committed by the U.S. imperialist aggressor forces. Among them are the incident in Tongduchon where a woman's hair was shaved, stunning the world, murder of Yun Kum I, the drop of bombs over Maehyang-ri and their killing of two middle schoolgirls by driving an armored car over them. 
					
					 The recently disclosed burial of defoliant by the U.S. imperialist forces is another tragic product of their presence in south Korea.
					
					 They have committed all sorts of crimes, occupying south Korea for several decades but have not been punished at all under SOFA. On the contrary, they have become more arrogant. 
					
					 They are free from punishment even after south Koreans are killed with their grudge unsettled, looting their properties and devastating their land. There is nowhere to complain even when people are killed by GIs, the brutes. This is the reality of south Korea. 
					
					 SOFA is an unprecedented document proving that south Korea is a colony of the U.S.
					
					 Its existence is a shame not only on the south Koreans but on all other Koreans as it is a slave document of modern version.
					
					 However, the Lee group of traitors is asking for the U.S. forces' permanent presence in south Korea while actively defending the agreement. It is offering the money collected from the people as taxes for the U.S. forces' upkeep while escalating confrontation with fellow countrymen as an executor of the U.S. aggression and war moves.
					
					 The Lee Myung Bak group's hideous sycophancy and treachery to serve the U.S. have lashed the nation into great fury.
					
					 The reality proves that the nation, to say nothing of the south Koreans, cannot escape pain and sufferings as long as SOFA and the U.S. imperialist aggression troops are allowed to remain in south Korea.
					
					 The shackling SOFA should be immediately abolished and the U.S. troops pulled out of south Korea as early as possible.
					
					 The south Koreans who value the dignity and sovereignty of the nation should turn out in the patriotic and sacred war to sweep away die-hard pro-U.S. traitor Lee and drive the U.S. forces out of south Korea.

articles.title: Chinese Art Group Gives Its Premiere
articles.content:
Chinese Art Group Gives Its Premiere 
						
 Pyongyang, July 9 (KCNA) -- An art group of dance drama "Confetti on Silk Road" of the Gansu Provincial Song and Dance Theatre of China gave its premiere at the Ponghwa Art Theatre Saturday. It is visiting the DPRK on the 50th anniversary of the DPRK-China treaty of friendship, cooperation and mutual assistance and the 30th anniversary of its performance in the DPRK.
					 The dance drama has a prologue, six chapters and an epilogue.
					
					 It deals with a story dating back to the Tang Dynasty based on a mural painting in Gansu Province to suit the aesthetic taste of the times and feelings of its people. It portrays friendly feelings forged between the Chinese people and peoples of foreign countries along the silk road.
					
					 The dance drama was acclaimed by the audience for the elegant and delicate dance movements to the tune of cheerful music and their high artistic skills.
					
					 Among the audience were An Tong Chun, minister of Culture, officials in the fields of culture and arts and media as well as creators and artistes.
					
					 Liu Hongcai, Chinese ambassador to the DPRK, and embassy staff members and Chinese guests staying here were also among the audience. 
					
					 The performance goes on.
					
					The Ministry of Culture hosted a reception for the art group at Pyongyang Koryo Hotel Saturday.

articles.title: Posters for Local Elections Produced in DPRK
articles.content:
Posters for Local Elections Produced in DPRK
 Pyongyang, July 9 (KCNA) -- Posters for elections of deputies to local power organs have been produced in the DPRK.
					 The posters are titled "Let Us Display the Might of Single-minded Unity!" and "Let Us All Vote for Candidates!"
					
					 Written on their upper parts are letters reading "July 24 is day of elections for deputies to provincial (municipal), city (district) and county people's assemblies."
					
					 The posters depict a person voting for a candidate against the background of worker, farmer and intellectual greeting the day of elections with labor achievements, fluttering flag of the Republic and electors full of happiness.
					
					 They call on all voters to turn out as one in further consolidating the revolutionary power.

articles.title: Program of Asian Regional Final Women Soccer Preliminaries for 2012 Olympiad
articles.content:
Program of Asian Regional Final Women Soccer Preliminaries for 2012 Olympiad
 Pyongyang, July 9 (KCNA) -- The Asian Football Federation recently announced the program of Asian regional final women soccer preliminaries for qualifying for the 2012 Olympiad.
					 The matches will be held in Shandong Province, China from September 1 to 11 by league matches among six teams.
					
					 The DPRK team will have its first match with its Australian rival on Sept. 1, its Chinese rival on Sept. 3, its south Korean rival on Sept. 5, its Japanese rival on Sept. 8 and its Thai rival on Sept. 11.

articles.title: Victorious Xinancha Battle
articles.content:
Victorious Xinancha Battle  
 Pyongyang, July 9 (KCNA) -- On July 10, Juche 25 (1936), the main unit of the Korean People's Revolutionary Army (KPRA) fought a battle against Japanese policemen in Xinancha, Fusong County, under the command of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The battle was aimed to contain the enemy militarily and capture weapons needed for the newly formed division of the KPRA.
					
					 The President planned to launch the attack on Xinancha between noon and one o'clock in the afternoon during which the policemen were supposed to have their lunch and clean their rifles.
					
					 Two assault parties and one covering party were formed for the attack.
					
					 The members of one assault party, disguised in peasant straw hats and clothes, approached the mud wall and quickly passed through the gate.
					
					 They then broke into the police barracks and captured policemen absorbed in rifle cleaning.
					
					 Another party dashed into other place and took policemen prisoner.
					
					 The victory in the battle demonstrated the fighting capacity of the KPRA. It also served as an important occasion in rallying broad segments of people to provide favorable conditions for the establishment of a stronghold in Mt. Paektu, and in improving the KPRA arms.

articles.title: World People Loud in Kim Il Sung's Praises
articles.content:
World People Loud in Kim Il Sung's Praises
 Pyongyang, July 9 (KCNA) -- Many people across the world have highly praised President Kim Il Sung for his noble virtues and great exploits conspicuous in the 20th century.
					 Ex-president of the U.S. Jimmy Carter, when meeting with Kim Il Sung in Pyongyang, admired his distinguished personality, great magnanimity, remarkable intelligence, deep-going insight and profound knowledge.
					
					 He said President Kim Il Sung was greater than George Washington, Thomas Jefferson and Abraham Lincoln put together, the three who represented the U.S. state building and destiny. He also said Kim Il Sung was greater than the world's state founders and the sun gods put together.
					
					 Luise Rinser, a woman writer of Germany, wrote a travelogue after visiting the DPRK. In the book she said, "President Kim Il Sung started the conversation in a humble way as he had always done. He was very composed, lively, kind and plain. He was also informal and humorous." 
					
					 Honored with the audience of Kim Il Sung, Genaro Carnero Checa, former secretary general of the Federation of Latin American Journalists,               said he would write a book titled "Seventieth Spring" congratulating the President on his 70th birthday. He then voiced his willingness to devote himself to writing the book about the eternal spring.
					
					 Many other people of the world are also calling him the sun of humankind in their books, reminiscences, poems and articles.

articles.title: Worthwhile Life under Care of Great Leader (6)
articles.content:
Worthwhile Life under Care of Great Leader (6)
						
 Pyongyang, July 9 (KCNA) -- Song Sun Ae, agitator of Excavator No.7 Hero Workteam of the Ryongyang Mine famous for Paekgumsan, has been widely known to the Korean people.
					It was General Secretary Kim Jong Il who put forward the girl agitator who hailed from Pyongyang as a pride of the country and the people.
					
					 In June, Juche 91 (2002) he visited the mine and met with her. He highly praised her for volunteering to work at the mine after watching TV serial drama "Paekgumsan", saying that her deed was laudable.
					
					 Determined to repay his loving care, she secured many spare parts by herself to operate at full capacity Excavator No. 7 associated with the undying leadership feats of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and greatly helped the workteam carry out its production plan and set a model of the mine.
					
					 Kim Jong Il visited the mine again in May Juche 98 (2009) and spoke highly of her deed. She has worked hard to lead the workteam members by setting a good example to them to be called "our agitator".

articles.title: DPRK Will Force Lee Myung Bak Group of Traitors to Stand Trial of History
articles.content:
DPRK Will Force Lee Myung Bak Group of Traitors to Stand Trial of History
 Pyongyang, July 9 (KCNA) -- South Korea dared to slander the dignity of the leadership of the DPRK and hurt its inviolable system and made provocative remark that it would not rule out even a war. Behind all these provocations were not only a few military hooligans but also Lee Myung Bak himself, says Rodong Sinmun Saturday in a bylined commentary.
					 It goes on:
					
					 The group of traitors is working hard to do harm to the single-minded unity in the DPRK and realize its ambition of "unification of systems" but it is preposterous for it to dream of doing so.
					
					 It is as foolish an act as trying to sweep the sea with a broom to think of pulling down the socialist system in the DPRK in which the leader, the party and the masses form an unbreakable harmonious whole.
					
					 The Lee group pushed the north-south relations to a phase which can not be repaired and, not content with it, is committing hideous provocations one after another. It seeks to tide over the ever-deepening ruling crisis of its conservative regime and escalate the tension on the Korean Peninsula and thus press for its anti-DPRK confrontation policy on the verge of bankruptcy.
					
					 The Lee group's political and military provocations are aimed to maintain its traitorous regime and keep the confrontation between the north and the south for an indefinite period. This is a never-to-be condoned crime.
					
					 The Korean nation will never pardon the group of traitors for its crimes but force it to stand the trial of history to meet punishment.

articles.title: DPRK to Settle Accounts with S. Korean Group for Its Hideous Provocations
articles.content:
DPRK to Settle Accounts with S. Korean Group for Its Hideous Provocations 
 Pyongyang, July 9 (KCNA) -- The army and people of the DPRK will never pardon the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors which pushed the north-south relations to an irreparable phase but launch a nationwide all-out offensive to put an end to its anti-DPRK confrontation moves and achieve the historic cause of national reunification, says Rodong Sinmun Saturday in a bylined article.
					 The Lee group's recent hideous provocation against the DPRK was an inevitable product of its moves for confrontation against reunification and a grave challenge to the inviolable dignity and system of the DPRK, the article said.
					
					 It went on:
					
					 Political and military provocations have been committed nonstop against the DPRK in south Korea but never has there been such a hideous case as daring to slander the dignity of the leadership of the DPRK before.
					
					 The Korean people regard the dignity of the country as the honor common to the nation and will turn out to defend it even though the sky may fall down and the earth break apart.
					
					 The Lee group is dreaming of pulling down the dignified socialist system in the DPRK in case of "contingency". Its politically-motivated provocation has lashed the Korean nation into a great fury.
					
					 Its moves to invade the DPRK by force while negating the idea and system of the fellow countrymen have already gone beyond the tolerance limit. There is no need to sit face to face with this group but only settling accounts with it by dint of arms remains to be done.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Praised as Sun of Juche: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Praised as Sun of Juche: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, July 9 (KCNA) -- President Kim Il Sung is the father of socialist Korea and the eternal sun of Juche who founded the immortal Juche idea, successfully carved out the destiny of the country and the nation along with the era of independence and laid a solid foundation of socialism, says Rodong Sinmun Saturday in a bylined article.
					 Thanks to his outstanding wisdom, unusual pursuit and extraordinary revolutionary practices, the Juche idea turned into a torch illumining the world and a treasured sword changing it, the article said.
					
					 It went on:
					
					 As the Juche idea guided the 20th century, the Korean revolution could win victories despite ever-changing political situation and the last century could shine as one of victory of the cause of independence against imperialism.
					
					 The President's revolutionary idea is demonstrating its immense vitality in the new century, too.
					
					 The greatest feat of the President was that he provided the powerful driving force of the revolution and built socialism centered on the popular masses.
					
					 It was thanks to the President's leadership believing in the people and relying on them that there created the history of overwhelming victory over aggressors and the heroic epic of epochal miracles and changes.
					
					The history of the President has been successfully carried forward even in the 21st century by General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					
					 A steady continuity is being given to the history of the sun as there are the ideology and leadership of Kim Jong Il who is identical to the President.
					
					 Socialist Korea bequeathed down by the President is demonstrating its might as a political and military power based on single-minded unity.
					
					 The DPRK, small in territory, has had access to nukes and launched its own satellites and is now dashing ahead toward the high eminence of a thriving nation. This is a shining fruition of Kim Jong Il's noble patriotism, ardent enthusiasm and attack spirit of Mt. Paektu.

articles.title: Japan's Servile Attitude to US Flailed
articles.content:
Japan's Servile Attitude to US Flailed 
						
 Pyongyang, July 9 (KCNA) -- Japan officially agreed with the U.S. on transferring the Futenma military base in Okinawa Prefecture to Henoko within the prefecture despite the strong protest by the Japanese people. This agreement was made at the recent U.S.-Japan "security" consultative committee. 
					 This is a product of Japan's servility toward the U.S. aimed to meet its own interests, says Rodong Sinmun Saturday in a bylined commentary.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 The Japanese authorities complied with its master's demand in utter disregard of the domestic public opinion. Its aim is to realize its ambition to emerge a military power baked by the U.S.
					
					 The Japanese militarist forces seek to launch an overseas aggression under the U.S. war umbrella and thus realize at any cost their old dream of the "Greater East Asia Co-prosperity Sphere." It is prompted by this ambition that Japan agreed with the U.S. to move the controversial military base to the place within the same prefecture under the pretext of tightened alliance with it while talking about regional instability.
					
					 It is also for this purpose that Japan seeks to transfer an interceptor missile for missile defense to a third country, departing from the framework of the "three principles of arms export" which it puts up as a symbol of the "pacifist state".
					
					 The aim sought by the Japanese reactionaries is to render defunct the principles which put a brake on their moves to become a military power and launch overseas aggression with the U.S. backing.
					
					 The development proves that Japan is set to bolster its moves to become a military power in a legitimate way and create international atmosphere favorable for launching overseas aggression.
					
					 It had better face up to the reality and drop its sinister attempt to seek its own interests through the humiliating acts of serving the U.S.

articles.title: Dissolution of S. Korean Minimum Wage Committee Called for
articles.content:
Dissolution of S. Korean Minimum Wage Committee Called for
						
 Pyongyang, July 9 (KCNA) -- The chairman of the south Korean Confederation of Trade Unions, the chairman of the Metal Trade Union and others held a press conference at the conference room of the Confederation on July 4 at which they accused the Minimum Wage Committee of laying an obstacle in the wage hike.
					 They said the committee was so base as to bring the negotiations on the minimum wage hike to a rupture.
					
					 The committee for the interests of the management side, not for the rights of the workers, should be dissolved immediately, they held.

articles.title: Lee Group Accused of Its Moves to Escalate Confrontation with DPRK
articles.content:
Lee Group Accused of Its Moves to Escalate Confrontation with DPRK
 Pyongyang, July 9 (KCNA) -- The chairpersons of the Headquarters of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan made public statements in denunciation of the hideous acts of the south Korean group of traitors to escalate the confrontation with the DPRK from July 4 to 6.
					 Pu Yong Uk, chairperson of the Osaka Prefectural Headquarters, noted that the hideous provocations of the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors are intolerable as they were blatant challenges and declaration of a war against the DPRK, stressing the need to put an end to the conservative group's reckless acts against reunification and the nation through a nation-wide struggle.
					
					 O Jae Se, chairperson of the Kanagawa Prefectural Headquarters, bitterly denounced the Lee group for perpetrating acts of treachery again out of extreme bitterness towards compatriots and confrontation hysteria. 
					
					 He said that he would arouse the officials of the Headquarters and compatriots to the struggle to sternly judge the Lee group's moves to escalate the confrontation with fellow countrymen.
					
					 Ri Ju Hak, chairperson of the Fukuoka Prefectural Headquarters, said that the Lee group would never get out of the abyss of ruin no matter how desperately it works. He warned the group not to run wild any longer.
					
					  Mun Kwang Hui, chairperson of the Aichi Prefectural Headquarters, said that all the Koreans in Japan would turn out in the struggle to smash the moves of the Lee group to escalate the confrontation with fellow countrymen and glorify the new decade of the 21st century as the one of reunification.

articles.title: Chongryon Calls for Nationwide Struggle against Lee Myung Bak Group of Traitors
articles.content:
Chongryon Calls for Nationwide Struggle against Lee Myung Bak Group of Traitors
						
 Pyongyang, July 9 (KCNA) -- Officials of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan issued statements on July 5 and 6 denouncing the Lee Myung Bak group for its unpardonable acts of treachery.
					 Jo Myong Jin, chairman of the Tokyo Metropolitan Headquarters of the Korean Youth League in Japan, said that the Korean youth and students in Japan would put an end to the moves of the Lee group for escalating the confrontation with fellow countrymen and igniting a war and open a new phase of national reunification in firm unity and solidarity with the youth and students in the north and the south and abroad.
					
					 Kim Song Jin, chairman of the Hokkaido Prefectural Headquarters of the League, noted the south Korean puppet group of traitors ran wild in a bid to dare hurt the dignity of the leadership of the DPRK. This will never be pardoned, he added.
					
					 Kang Kyong Hui, chairwoman of the Kyoto Prefectural Headquarters of the Korean Democratic Women's Union in Japan, said the Union would support with warm compatriotic feelings the just struggle of the women and other people of broad strata in the south for independence, democracy and reunification and wage a dynamic struggle to shatter the moves of the group to escalate the confrontation with fellow countrymen through a nationwide all-out offensive.
					
					 O Yong Sun, chairwoman of the Hiroshima Prefectural Headquarters of the Union, declared that the Lee group should apologize to the whole nation for its hideous moves to escalate the above-said confrontation and face a stern judgment of history.

articles.title: Letter to Kim Jong Il from Guinean Juche Idea Followers
articles.content:
Letter to Kim Jong Il from Guinean Juche Idea Followers 
Pyongyang, July 9 (KCNA) -- The participants of the Guinean national seminar on the exploits of President Kim Il Sung, the founder of socialist Korea, sent a letter to General Secretary Kim Jong Il on June 25.
					 The letter said that Kim Il Sung successfully embodied the Juche idea, liberating the Korean nation from the colonial yoke of Japanese imperialism, founding the first people's democratic state in the east and developing the DPRK into a socialist power, independent in politics, self-supporting in economy and self-reliant in national defence.
					
					 Kim Il Sung consolidated the gains of the revolution by leading the country and people and powerfully promoted the human cause of independence by wisely steering the liberation movement of the world oppressed people, the letter noted.
					
					 Noting that he brought about a leaping advance in the Non-aligned Movement, helping the world progressives cultivate the strength to carve out their destiny with responsibility, the letter stressed that he is always remembered by all people who love peace and justice as an outstanding great man of the 20th century. 
					
					 The participants of the seminar highly lauded Kim Il Sung for performing immortal revolutionary exploits and leader Kim Jong Il for leading the DPRK to register great achievements under the banner of Songun, the letter said, and continued:
					
					 The Guinean Juche idea followers once again reiterated their firm pledge to deeply study the Juche idea, Songun idea and always take the lead in the activities to widely disseminate it.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Feat Praised by Italian Party Official
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Feat Praised by Italian Party Official
						
 Pyongyang, July 9 (KCNA) -- Sergio Carraro, organizational secretary of the Struggle for the Peace and Socialism of Italy, issued a statement on July 2 on the occasion of the 17th anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung.
					 It is thanks to the Juche idea founded by the President and the solid foundation of the independent national economy laid by him that the Korean people are confidently advancing along the path chosen by themselves despite the persistent worldwide economic financial crisis and the U.S. and all other hostile forces' sanctions against the DPRK, the statement said.
					
					 He liberated the country and defended the sovereignty and dignity of the nation through the wars against the two imperialisms and built in Korea the socialist system whose masters are the people, strong in politics, economy and military affairs, it noted.
					
					 In order to shatter the moves of the anti-reunification forces at home and abroad and achieve the national unity and reunification from the outset of the country's division he put forward the proposals for national reunification including the three principles of national reunification and wisely led the Korean people, it said, adding: 
					
					The Korean people are holding Kim Il Sung as the eternal President of the DPRK and waging a drive to build a great prosperous powerful nation and reunify the country, rallied close around General Secretary Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Remembered by Foreign Newspapers
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Remembered by Foreign Newspapers
 Pyongyang, July 9 (KCNA) -- Foreign newspapers carried special write-ups on the occasion of the 17th anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The Iranian paper Iran News on July 3 devoted one whole page to articles illustrated with a portrait of the smiling President and a photo showing the Korean people's boundless longing and reverence for him.
					
					 The paper in an article titled "Great man of century" said mankind always remembers the President as the great man of the century. He will be always alive with mankind as the sun is eternal, it added.
					
					 The Bangladeshi paper Blits on July 2 carried an article headlined "Songun idea, the guiding principle of the Workers' Party of Korea" with his portrait.
					
					 The Lao paper Vatelao on July 4 edited an article titled "Tribute to respected President Kim Il Sung of the DPRK" with his photo.
					
					 The article said that the cause of perpetuating the memory of the President has been successfully accomplished in the DPRK under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Korean People's Just Cause Supported by Austrian Organization
articles.content:
Korean People's Just Cause Supported by Austrian Organization
 Pyongyang, July 9 (KCNA) -- The Vienna City Committee of the Left Bloc of the Austrian Trade Union Federation adopted a resolution on the occasion of the June 25-July 27 month of anti-U.S. joint struggle on July 2.
					 The resolution accused the south Korean authorities of committing serious provocative acts of hurting the dignity of the leadership of the DPRK and defiling its system and the Korean People's Army.
					
					 It voiced opposition to all sanctions aimed at obstructing socialist construction in the DPRK and stifling it.
					
					 It also expressed positive support for all the measures of the DPRK to safeguard its sovereignty.
					
					 The resolution said the organization would join the working class of the DPRK in the struggle against imperialism.

articles.title: DPRK's Stand Supported by British and Ecuadorian Organizations
articles.content:
DPRK's Stand Supported by British and Ecuadorian Organizations
 Pyongyang, July 9 (KCNA) -- The British and Ecuadorian organizations made public statements in support of the statement of a spokesman for the government of the DPRK and the statement of a spokesman for the Supreme Command of the Korean People's Army.
					 The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy, the British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea and the British Branch of the Korean Friendship Association in their joint statement on July 1 hailed the stand of the DPRK government and the Supreme Command of the KPA as the most fair and aboveboard one to frustrate the evermore undisguised anti-DPRK moves of the south Korean puppet forces. 
					
					 Noting that it is the wild dream of the south Korean puppet forces to bring down Korean-style socialism, the statement demanded the Lee Myung Bak puppet group stop such foolish acts as heaping slanders and calumnies on the DPRK and threatening world peace.
					
					 The statement said the organizations support the DPRK's stand to firmly defend socialist Korea and take a merciless retaliation against the south Korean puppet forces.
					
					 The statement called on the British progressive forces to extend unequivocal support and solidarity to the Korean people in their struggle to safeguard socialist Korea and smash the provocations of the south Korean puppet forces.
					
					 The Ecuador-Guaranda Institute for Friendship and Cultural Solidarity with the Korean People in a statement on July 29 termed all provocations of traitor Lee Myung Bak and the puppet military group a clear declaration of a war against the DPRK and bitterly denounced them.

articles.title: Congolese Millennium Monument Erected with DPRK Cooperation
articles.content:
Congolese Millennium Monument Erected with DPRK Cooperation
						
 Pyongyang, July 9 (KCNA) -- Thanks to the cooperation of the DPRK Congolese Millennium Monument was erected.
					 An unveiling ceremony took place in Brazzaville on June 30.
					
					 The minister of Culture and Arts of Congo in his speech referred to the background against which the monument was erected and its significance and its theme, highly appreciating the labor exploits performed by Korean technicians for the erection of the monument.
					
					 Then the minister of State for Social Affairs and Culture of Congo, the DPRK ambassador there and other personages cut the unveiling tape before going round the monument.

articles.title: Bangladeshi Newspaper Carries Kim Jong Il's Work
articles.content:
Bangladeshi Newspaper Carries Kim Jong Il's Work
Pyongyang, July 9 (KCNA) -- The Bangladeshi newspaper Blits carried General Secretary Kim Jong Il's work "On Having a Correct Viewpoint and Understanding of the Juche Philosophy" on July 2.
					 The work, published on Oct. 25, Juche 79 (1990), clarifies the issues of having correct understanding of the originality and advantages of the Juche philosophy distinct from the preceding philosophy, the essential characteristics of man as a social being and the three transformations: transformation of nature, remoulding of men and social transformation.

articles.title: Crisis of Regime Gets Serious in Japan
articles.content:
Regime Crisis Gets Serious in Japan
 Pyongyang, July 9 (KCNA) -- The regime crisis is getting serious in Japan with the resignation of the minister for Earthquake Disaster Rehabilitation as a momentum.
					 Some days ago Minister Matsumoto told the governors of Miyagi and Iwate Prefectures hit by mass earthquake that he would not help those who do not display their wisdom, sparking off a furor. This forced him to formally resign Tuesday.
					
					 On Wednesday the Japanese prime minister admitted the blame for appointing Matsumoto as minister and apologized for it.
					
					 There is an increasing view within the Democratic Party that the governing ability of the present government has already been paralyzed due to Matsumoto's resignation, the Yomiuri Shimbun reported.

articles.title: Advanced Basic Party Organizations and Members and Cadres of CPC Commended
articles.content:
Advanced Basic Party Organizations and Members and Cadres of CPC Commended 
 Beijing, July 8 (KCNA) --A ceremony of awarding official commendations to advanced basic party organizations, excellent members and cadres of the Communist Party of China at national enterprises took place recently on its 90th anniversary. 
					 232 organizations, 191 party members and 129 party cadres were awarded commendations at the ceremony.

articles.title: Notice on Studying and Implementing Hu Jintao's Important Speech Issued
articles.content:
Notice on Studying and Implementing Hu Jintao's Important Speech Issued
						
 Beijing, July 8 (KCNA) -- The General Political Department of the Chinese People's Liberation Army recently issued a notice to the army and armed police units calling for sincerely studying and implementing the important speech made by General Secretary Hu Jintao at the meeting celebrating the 90th founding anniversary of the Communist Party of China.
					 The notice said that the speech made by Hu Jintao serves as a strategic assignment for comprehensively advancing the cause of socialism with Chinese characteristics. It also called upon the party committees at different levels and political bodies to study and implement his speech, regarding it as an important political duty during the fixed period at present and in the future, strengthening the organizational guidance and practically holding fast to the work to put it into practice.

articles.title: Standing Conference of State Council Meets in China
articles.content:
Standing Conference of State Council Meets in China
 Beijing, July 8 (KCNA) -- Premier of the State Council Wen Jiabao convened its standing conference on July 6 and assigned the work to set right the issues raised in discussion including the execution of the central budget for 2011.
					 The conference approved the "Plan proposal for supporting the projects for the economic and social development in Tibet during the 12th Five Year Plan".
					
					 It underscored the need to systematically promote the construction in Tibet depending on the preparation of work force for its projects.

articles.title: "Rules on Key Equipment and Facilities Management of Munitions Industry" Published in China
articles.content:
"Rules on Key Equipment and Facilities Management of Munitions Industry" Published in China
						
 Beijing, July 8 (KCNA) -- China recently published "the rules on key equipment and facilities management of the munitions industry".
					 Their institution is aimed at enhancing the nation's level of defense science researches and intensifying the key equipment and facilities management in the field of munitions industry to ensure their security and effective use.
					
					 The rules consist of 25 provisions and will take effect from October 1, 2011, a report said.

articles.title: China Launches Satellite
articles.content:
China Launches Satellite
						
 Beijing, July 8 (KCNA) -- China Wednesday launched satellite "Shijian 11-3" to successfully put it on the expected orbit.
					 The satellite was launched by carrier rocket "Long March-2" at a satellite launching center.
					
					 It will be mainly used for the test of space science and technology.

articles.title: Iran Rejects US Wrong Assertion
articles.content:
Iran Rejects US Wrong Assertion
Tehran, July 8 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Iranian Foreign Ministry in a press conference on Tuesday rejected the U.S. wrong assertion.
					 He labeled as a sheer lie the recent U.S. claim that Iran's Islamic Revolution Guard Corps is offering arms equipment to the armed groups of Iraq and Afghanistan.
					
					 The U.S. claim is aimed at diverting elsewhere public attention to its repeated failures in Iraq and Afghanistan and inventing a pretext to keep its forces there for a long period, he charged.
					
					 The regional countries will not allow the military presence of the occupation forces any longer, he said, urging the foreign forces to immediately withdraw from the region for the sake of peace and security.

articles.title: Iran Testfires Missiles
articles.content:
Iran Testfires Missiles
						
 Tehran, July 8 (KCNA) -- Iran testfired two surface-to-sea missiles on Wednesday in the vicinity of southern port city of Jask.
					 The missiles, called "Tondar" and "Persian Gulf", hit the pre-planned targets, a report said.

articles.title: Israeli Army Kills More Palestinians
articles.content:
sraeli Army Kills More Palestinians
 Pyongyang, July 9 (KCNA) -- The Israeli army is increasing the regional situation while perpetrating violence on Palestinians.
					An Israeli drone Tuesday fired a missile at a group of Palestinians to the east of central Gaza Strip, killing two immediately and wounding a third.
					
					 The Israeli army forces arrested six Palestinians early Tuesday after storming their homes in different areas in the West Bank cities of Jenin, Ramallah, Bethlehem and Hebron.

articles.title: US "War on Terrorism" Termed War against Human Rights
articles.content:
US "War on Terrorism" Termed War against Human Rights
						
 Pyongyang, July 9 (KCNA) -- At least 20 academicians of the U.S. Brown University recently published a review of casualties caused by the U.S. administration's "war on terrorism" in various parts of the world.
					 According to it, total of 224,000 to 258,000 people lost their lives including 6,000 U.S. soldiers after the U.S. launched the "war on terrorism" following the September 11, 2001 incident.
					
					 The number of civilian deaths reached 172,000 among them including 125,000 Iraqis.
					
					 It is not certain whether this data is accurate or not but the number apparently reflects the people's repugnance against the "anti-terror war."
					
					 This war has been censured and rejected worldwide for its reckless and unethical nature.
					
					 A great number of young Americans met death and innocent civilians are being killed almost everyday in various countries by the U.S. forces' latest weapons.
					
					 Huge funds are being spent for the "anti-terror war" aimed at world domination and, consequently, not only the U.S. but also the rest of the world are suffering from a financial crisis.
					
					 The world, therefore, brands the "war on terrorism" fought by the U.S. for a decade as a war violating human rights and state-sponsored terrorism which wantonly violates the right to existence of the people and the right to development of countries.
					
					 The U.S. had better face up to the trend of the times and immediately stop the reactionary and brigandish "war on terrorism."

articles.title: US Dollar in Danger
articles.content:
US Dollar in Danger
						
 Pyongyang, July 9 (KCNA) -- The U.S. dollar may lose its status as the world reserve currency, the British paper Financial Times said.
					 Analysts of the UBS Bank of Switzerland recently conducted an opinion poll among experts of major world banks. Over half respondents predicted that the U.S. dollar would lose its status as the world reserve currency to be replaced by other currencies within 25 years to come.

articles.title: 4 NATO soldiers killed in Afghanistan
articles.content:
NATO soldiers killed in Afghanistan
 Pyongyang, July 9 (KCNA) -- More NATO soldiers in Afghanistan met deaths due to the attack of the resistance forces of the country.
					 Four NATO soldiers were killed in restive eastern Afghanistan on Tuesday.

articles.title: Venezuela Celebrates 200th Independence Day
articles.content:
Venezuela Celebrates 200th Independence Day
 Pyongyang, July 9 (KCNA) -- Venezuela celebrated the 200th Independence Day Tuesday.
					 A military parade took place in Caracas.
					
					 Government officials and tens of thousands of people and delegations and delegates of foreign countries watched the parade.
					
					 Prior to the parade, Venezuelan President Hugo Chavez launched the nationwide celebration with a speech.
					
					 Only the genuine independence helps the people achieve well-being and progress, he said, stressing the Venezuelan people will not give up their independence to anyone but defend freedom.
					
					 Colorful events took place in local cities.

articles.title: Education Issue Gets Serious Worldwide
articles.content:
Education Issue Gets Serious Worldwide
						
 Pyongyang, July 9 (KCNA) -- About 796 million adults still lack basic literacy skills, according to statistics released on Monday by the United Nations Economic and Social Council
					 At least 67 million children of school age are still denied the right to education due to financial, social or other challenges, such as health problems and armed conflict, the statistics said.

articles.title: Earthquakes Jolt Indonesia, New Zealand
articles.content:
Earthquakes Jolt Indonesia, New Zealand
						
 Pyongyang, July 9 (KCNA) -- A moderate earthquake with magnitude of 5.4 jolted Sumatra island of Indonesia on Tuesday.
					 The quake struck with epicenter at 41 km southwest Gunungsitoli of North Sumatra Province.
					
					 On the same day a 6.5-magnitude earthquake hit New Zealand.

articles.title: No perdonará jamás crímenes de Lee Myung Bak, señala Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
No perdonará jamás crímenes de Lee Myung Bak, señala Rodong Sinmun
						
Pyongyang, 9 de julio (ATCC) -- La banda de Lee Myung Bak ofenda arbitrariamente la máxima dignidad y el sagrado sistema de la República Popular Democrática de Corea y hace provocaciones de desatar la guerra, lo cual no puede ser considerada solo locura de unos maniacos de la capa militar. Detrás de estas provocaciones está el traidor Lee.
					Así señala el periódico Rodong Sinmun en un comentario individual difundido este sábado y continúa:
					
					Es ridículo que la banda de Lee actúa desesperadamente para romper la unidad monolítica entre el líder, el partido y las masas de la RPDC y realizar su ambición de la "reunificación de sistemas".
					
					La banda de Lee llevó las relaciones íntercoreanas a la ruptura irrecuperable y perpetra una tras otra monstruosas provocaciones sin precedentes para evadir la crisis de "poder" conservador y realizar su política conflictiva anti-RPDC en ruina agravando la situación de la Península Coreana.
					
					La nación coreana no perdonará jamás los crímenes de la banda de los traidores títeres y los castigará rotundamente en el tribunal de la historia.

articles.title: Portavoz de CE denuncia educación anti-reunificación de Lee Myung Bak
articles.content:
Portavoz de CE denuncia educación anti-reunificación de Lee Myung Bak
						
Pyongyang, 9 de julio (ATCC) -- En relación con que la banda de traidores surcoreanos intensifica la educación anti-reunificación entre los habitantes surcoreanos, el portavoz del Comité de Educación de la República Popular Democrática de Corea hizo pública el día 8 una declaración como sigue:
					En estos días, la banda del traidor Lee Myung Bak se aferra a las imprudentes provocaciones contra la RPDC en las unidades del ejército títere en el frente ofendiendo el dignidad de ésta, mientras libra una campaña de educación anti-reunificación entre todos los surcoreanos, que fomenta la confrontación fratricida y calumnia el sistema de la RPDC.
					
					El Ministerio de Reunificación títere distribuye los materiales de "educación de reunificación" elaborados para denigrar a la RPDC y embellece su política conflictiva contra ésta, lo cual es un grave desafío imperdonable a la RPDC.
					
					Los tipejos de esa cartera eliminaron "asociado", "relaciones de diálogo y cooperación"  y otras palabras relacionadas con el Norte en los anteriores materiales didácticos y los sustituyeron con las frases que inciten el odio a sus connacionales y la confrontación entre ambos regímenes.
					
					Tergiversó la pasada guerra coreana del 25 de junio e incidentes de conflictos militares N-S acusándolos de "agresión al Sur" y "provocación del Norte" y calumnió el sistema y hasta la máxima dignidad de la RPDC.
					
					Por lo tanto, los hombres docentes y otros círculos sociales del Sur de Corea elevan sus voces de censura calificándolos de "guía de educación en la  división".
					
					El Ministerio títere de Reunificación habla tanto de que tras distribuir estos materiales didácticos  a todas las escuelas primarias, secundarias y superiores, las bibliotecas y los órganos docentes y de investigación en toda la extensión surcoreana, los enseñará a todos los habitantes surcoreanos.
					
					Tales maquinaciones despiertan vehemente odio de los educadores y de los demás coreanos.
					
					El Comité de Educación de la República Popular Democrática de Corea denuncia severamente la publicación de susodichos materiales didácticos calificándola de otra grave provocación anti-RPDC, de injuria a la sagrada educación y de criminalidad anti-reunificación, anti-nación y anti-ética.
					
					Cualquier sociedad considera como labor sagrada la educación que instruye la justicia, la veracidad y conocimientos científicos y forma a las verdaderas personas sociales.
					
					La "educación sobre la reunificación" de dicha banda es acto diabólico encaminado a tergiversar la verdad y sembrar la extremada hostilidad y la conciencia de enfrentamiento contra sus connacionales y convertirlos en enemigos eternos. 
					
					De mal en peor, el ministro títere de Reunificación, Hyon In Thaek, que era profesor, dirigiendo la edición de tales manuales, hizo enmendar todos sus contenidos desde el punto de vista conflictivo a pesar de las censuras de la opinión pública y los revisó. También hizo aumentar sus volúmenes en cientos de miles ejemplares y ordenó al ministerio de Reunificación que pague primeramente los gastos necesarios para su distribución.
					
					Tales hechos muestran claramente que Hyon es fanático de confrontación anti-reunificación.
					
					La historia registra a los criminales de guerra, como la pandilla nazista de Hitler, que lanzaron sus pueblos a la guerra mundial contra la humanidad armándolos con el odio y el chovinismo a otra nación. Pero, no conoce a los tipejos como Hyon que se entrega abiertamente a las maniobras anti-éticas.
					
					Tal alboroto de educación es un esfuerzo desesperado de quienes se someten a la bancarrota total de su política interna y externa y a la crisis irrecuperable ante el rencor de la opinión pública y la condena de la nación, provocará sólo censuras internas y externas y acelerará su autodestrucción.
					
					Hyon In Thaek y otros traidores, que abusan de hasta la noble labor docente como medio de enfrentamiento contra la connacional RPDC, no evitarán el miserable destino ante la indignación y la condena de toda la nación coreana.

articles.title: Se estrena en Pyongyang el conjunto artístico de China
articles.content:
Se estrena en Pyongyang el conjunto artístico de China
Pyongyang, 9 de julio (ATCC) -- Se estrenó el día 9 en el capitalino Teatro de Arte Ponghwa el conjunto artístico de drama danzario "Confeti en el camino de seda" del Teatro de Canción y Danza de la Provincia de Gansu de China.
					El conjunto artístico está de visita en Corea con motivo del  50º aniversario de la concertación del acuerdo de amistad, cooperación y ayuda mutua Corea-China y del 30º aniversario de representación en Corea de aquel drama danzario "Confeti en el camino de seda".
					
					Este drama coreográfico consta de prólogo, epílogo y otros seis capítulos.
					
					Los ejecutantes fueron objeto de efusivos aplausos de los espectadores por haber mostrado altas habilidades a través de los delicados y minuciosos movimientos coreográficos al compás de las graciosas melodías.
					
					Lo vieron el ministro de Cultura An Tong Chun, funcionarios, creadores y artistas de las ramas de cultura, arte, prensa e información, el embajador Liu Hongcai y otros integrantes de la embajada china y los huéspedes chinos en Corea.
					
					La función continúa.
					
					Por otra parte, el Ministerio de Cultura de Corea ofreció el mismo día en el Hotel Coryo de Pyongyang un banquete en honor del conjunto artístico chino.

articles.title: Jonminthukwi demanda retirada de tropas yanquis del Sur de Corea
articles.content:
Jonminthukwi demanda retirada de tropas yanquis del Sur de Corea
						
Pyongyang, 9 de julio (ATCC) -- Con motivo del 45º aniversario de la fabricación del leonino "convenio de administración" Sur de Corea-Estados Unidos, el portavoz de la dirección norteña del Comité Pannacional de Averiguación Especial para Esclarecer Verdaderos Aspectos de Crímenes de Tropas Norteamericanas (Jonminthukwi) hizo pública el día 9 la siguiente declaración:
					El "convenio de administración" Sur de Corea-EE.UU., firmado el 9 de julio de 1966, siendo el documento esclavista de cuño moderno que justifica la ocupación del Sur de Corea por parte de las tropas agresoras norteamericanas y tolera sus atrocidades y crímenes, atribuye a las tropas yanquis el privilegio y posición ilimitados en el juicio penal, el uso del territorio y establecimientos, los negocios tributarios, la administración de la "salida y entrada", etc. en el territorio surcoreano.
					
					En virtud de ese convenio leonino y parcial, las tropas norteamericanas vinieron cometiendo diariamente durante 45 años pasados violaciones, saqueos, masacres, estupros y otros crímenes de toda índole, actuando como el gobernante real y ente extraterritorial. 
					
					El rape a una mujer de Tongduchon, el asesinato a Yun Kum I, el lanzamiento de bombas en la comuna de Maehyang, el asesinato a dos alumnas de la secundaria con un carro blindado y otras atrocidades bestiales de las tropas norteamericanas, las recuerda vívidamente todo el mundo. 
					
					El caso de enterramiento de defoliante recién revelado es otro resultado trágico de la ocupación del Sur de Corea por parte de tropas norteamericanas. 
					
					Durante varios decenios, los uniformados yanquis ocupantes del Sur de Corea perpetraron los crímenes de toda índole. Pero, no reciben ningún castigo según el "convenio de administración", sino actúan con más arrogancia. 
					
					  Ahora en el Sur de Corea no se cuestionan la matanza, el saqueo y la devastación territorial por parte de las tropas norteamericanas. Y los habitantes no pueden quejarse de sus sufrimientos injustos por bestias yanquis. Esto es la realidad del Sur de Corea. 
					
					Prácticamente, el "convenio de administración" es un documento vendepatria sin precedente que muestra que el Sur de Corea es la colonia de EE.UU. 
					
					La existencia de este documento es la ignominia de los habitantes surcoreanos y de toda la nación coreana. 
					
					A pesar de esto, la banda del traidor Lee suplica la ocupación eterna de las tropas norteamericanas en el Sur de Corea protegiendo activamente este convenio,  y se entrega a la confrontación fratricida siguiendo a las maquinaciones bélicas agresivas de EE.UU. y sacrifican hasta el impuesto de los surcoreanos para mantener las tropas norteamericanas.
					
					Tal acto proyanqui, servil y vendepatria de la banda de Lee provoca la indignación de toda la nación coreana.
					
					La realidad muestra que si dejan intacto el "convenio de administración" Sur de Corea-EE.UU. y las tropas agresivas norteamericanas ocupantes de esta parte, los surcoreanos y toda la nación coreana no podrán evitar penalidades y desgracias.
					
					Se debe abolir de inmediato el ignominioso "convenio de administración" y las tropas agresivas norteamericanas deben  ser retiradas cuanto antes.
					
					Los surcoreanos, que aprecian la dignidad y la soberanía de la nación, deben levantarse con valentía en la sagrada lucha patriótica por aniquilar rotundamente la banda del traidor Lee y expulsar a las tropas yanquis ocupantes del territorio surcoreano.
